info.title: API de Rewrite
info.summary: Referencia de la API de proyectos (Projects, API Keys, Templates, Webhooks).
info.description:
Referencia publica completa de los endpoints de nivel proyecto en Rewrite API v1.

Todos los endpoints devuelven un sobre consistente (`ok`, `data` y `cursor` opcional).
Usa bearer token (API key) con scopes o sesion autenticada por cookie.

tags.name: Templates
tags.description: Gestiona plantillas SMS reutilizables con variables.

data.name: order_shipped
data.content: Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.

get.description: Lista las plantillas del proyecto con paginacion por cursor.\n\nUsa `limit`, `after` y `before` para paginar.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
x-codeSamples.source:
from rewrite import Rewrite
import requests

client = Rewrite(api_key='rw_live_your_api_key')

response = requests.request(
    'GET',
    'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates',
    headers={
        'Authorization': "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key",
    },
)
print(response.json())

x-codeSamples.label: Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'GET');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Get.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("GET", null)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'

value.name: order_shipped
value.content: Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.

post.description: Crea una plantilla reutilizable con variables y valores de fallback.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'POST');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Post.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("POST", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "POST"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"name\":\"order_shipped\",\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"name":"order_shipped","content":"Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}'

parameters.name: identifier
parameters.description: ID unico de plantilla o nombre unico de plantilla.

data.name: order_shipped

patch.description: Actualiza parcialmente el contenido de la plantilla y/o sus variables.

x-codeSamples.label: Node.js
Go
Python
Java
PHP
x-codeSamples.source:
<?php
$ch = curl_init();
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST, 'PATCH');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key',
  'Content-Type: application/json',
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, '{"content":"Hi {{first_name}}, your package {{order_id}} has shipped.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}');
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);

x-codeSamples.label: Ruby
x-codeSamples.source:
uri = URI.parse('https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500')
http = Net::HTTP.new(uri.host, uri.port)
http.use_ssl = true
request = Net::HTTP::Patch.new(uri.request_uri)
request['Authorization'] = 'Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
request['Content-Type'] = 'application/json'
request.body = "{\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your package {{order_id}} has shipped.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}"
response = http.request(request)
puts response.body

x-codeSamples.label: Kotlin
x-codeSamples.source:
val client = OkHttpClient()
val body = "{\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your package {{order_id}} has shipped.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".toRequestBody("application/json".toMediaType())
val request = Request.Builder()
  .url("https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500")
  .addHeader("Authorization", "Bearer rw_live_your_api_key")
  .method("PATCH", body)
  .build()
val response = client.newCall(request).execute()

x-codeSamples.label: Swift
x-codeSamples.source:
let url = URL(string: "https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500")!
var request = URLRequest(url: url)
request.httpMethod = "PATCH"
request.setValue("rw_live_your_api_key", forHTTPHeaderField: "Authorization")
request.setValue("application/json", forHTTPHeaderField: "Content-Type")
request.httpBody = "{\"content\":\"Hi {{first_name}}, your package {{order_id}} has shipped.\",\"variables\":[{\"name\":\"first_name\",\"fallback\":\"customer\"},{\"name\":\"order_id\",\"fallback\":\"0000\"}]}".data(using: .utf8)
let (data, _, _) = try await URLSession.shared.data(for: request)

x-codeSamples.label: C#
cURL
x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X PATCH 'https://api.rewritetoday.com/v1/projects/748395130237498368/templates/748395130237498500' \\
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer rw_live_your_api_key'
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \\
  -d '{"content":"Hi {{first_name}}, your package {{order_id}} has shipped.","variables":[{"name":"first_name","fallback":"customer"},{"name":"order_id","fallback":"0000"}]}'

bearerAuth.description: Envia tu API key como `Authorization: Bearer <api-key>`.

after.name: after
after.description: ID unico de cursor para obtener elementos despues de este valor.

before.name: before
before.description: ID unico de cursor para obtener elementos antes de este valor.

persist.description: Indica si se puede solicitar otra pagina usando `next`.

next.description: Cursor para solicitar la siguiente pagina (`after`).

Cursor.description: Metadatos de cursor para respuestas paginadas.

OkEmptyResponse.description: Respuesta exitosa. Este endpoint no devuelve datos.

name.description: Clave de variable usada por tu app.

fallback.description: Valor por defecto cuando tu payload no proporciona la variable.

TemplateVariable.description: Variable con nombre usada en el cuerpo de la plantilla.

createdAt.description: Marca de tiempo de creacion UTC.

Template.description: Metadatos de plantilla y snapshot opcional de contenido.

example.name: order_shipped
example.content: Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.

data.content: Hi {{first_name}}, your order {{order_id}} is on the way.
